Class CORSAuthenticator.Builder

java.lang.Object
org.attribyte.snook.auth.CORSAuthenticator.Builder
Enclosing class:
CORSAuthenticator
public static class CORSAuthenticator.Builder extends Object
Builds immutable instances of the authenticator.
